results.summary: An 18-year-old rapper is stabbed to death in Birmingham after attending a tribute event to a knife murder victim.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/5683bdee-66be-fd44-8b10-f96af3ef65bf"><image id="70052166"/><paragraph role="introduction">An 18-year-old rapper has been stabbed to death after attending a tribute night to a knife murder victim.</paragraph><paragraph>The musician, named locally as Joshua Ribera but who used the stage name Depzman, died in hospital after being stabbed outside TC's club in Selly Oak, Birmingham, on Friday night.</paragraph><paragraph>He had been attending a fundraising event in memory of Kyle Sheehan, 16, who was killed a year ago.</paragraph><paragraph>An 18-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of Mr Ribera's murder.</paragraph><crosshead>'Talented MC'</crosshead><image id="63213441"/><paragraph>Tributes have been paid to Mr Ribera by other rappers including Frisco who described the death as "sad".</paragraph><paragraph>Meanwhile Wretch 32 said Depzman was "a young, talented MC".</paragraph><paragraph>The stabbing happened in Coronation Road shortly before 23:00 BST on Friday.</paragraph><paragraph>Mr Ribera was taken to hospital where he died in the early hours of Saturday morning.</paragraph><paragraph>At 11:45 a man attended a police station in Dudley and was arrested on suspicion of murder.</paragraph><paragraph>The attack came after an event in memory of  <!-- CPS Asset ID: 24192672 --><link><caption>Kyle Sheehan</caption><url platform="highweb" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-birmingham-21618688"/></link> who was stabbed in the leg in the Bartley Green area of Birmingham on 21 September 2012.</paragraph><paragraph>He died from the injury. No-one has been charged with his killing.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/5683bdee-66be-fd44-8b10-f96af3ef65bf"><paragraph>An 18-year-old rapper has been stabbed to death after attending a tribute night to a knife murder victim.</paragraph><paragraph>The musician, named locally as Joshua Ribera but who used the stage name Depzman, died in hospital after being stabbed outside TC's club in Selly Oak, Birmingham, on Friday night.</paragraph><paragraph>He had been attending a fundraising event in memory of Kyle Sheehan, 16, who was killed a year ago.</paragraph><paragraph>An 18-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of Mr Ribera's murder.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

63213441.caption: Kyle Sheehan was stabbed in the leg on 21 September 2012

70052166.caption: The stabbing happened outside TC's in the Selly Oak area of Birmingham

items.summary: The grandmother of a teenager stabbed to death urges his killer to come forward as the family marks what would have been his 17th birthday.
items.headline: Plea by grandmother of Kyle Sheehan to find killer

items.summary: The family of a 16-year-old stabbed in a Birmingham street appeal for information, saying his death has been "just horrendous".
items.headline: Kyle Sheehan death in Birmingham: Family appeal for information

items.summary: Three people are arrested after a 16-year-old boy is left in a critical condition after being stabbed in a Birmingham street.
items.headline: Bartley Green stabbing: Three arrested

results.headline: Rapper Depzman stabbed to death after Kyle Sheehan tribute
